summary: The diff implements a more robust IC deploy script with preflight/build steps, log file creation under frontend/deploy-logs, and explicit canister-existence checks/creation (at least for the backend, with the remainder truncated). DEPLOYMENT_IC.md is described as expanded to include mainnet steps and troubleshooting. However, substantial unrelated application feature work (paywall/admin functions and many UI feature summaries) appears in the changes despite not being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified backend paywall/admin-related types and functions (e.g., PaywallStatus, AdminPaywallStatus, setPaywallStatus, getPaywallStatus, getCallerPaywallStatus, getAllAdminPaywallStates), which are unrelated to mainnet deployment reliability requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude adding new application features unrelated to mainnet deployment reliability; the requested work was limited to the deploy script and deployment documentation.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend feature work described/rolled up in frontend-file-summaries (new/expanded hooks, components, encryption utilities, UI panels, paywall gating, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for changes to frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh and frontend/DEPLOYMENT_IC.md; these application/UI feature changes are not requested.
